required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Omeprazole on the Pharmacokinetics of SHR6390 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, One-arm, Open-label, Fixed-sequence Study to Evaluate the Effect of Omeprazole on the Pharmacokinetics of SHR6390 in Healthy Male and Female Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is a one-arm, fixed-sequence study to compare the pharmacokinetic profiles of SHR6390 in absence and presence of prior administration of proton pump inhibitor Omeprazole. The increased gastric pH achieved by the treatment with multiple doses of Omeprazole might affect the absorption process of SHR6390.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The study is a single-center, open, single-dose, Fixed-sequence clinical trial.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day7after the first dose and from Day17 to Day23 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed serum concentration (Cmax) for SHR6390 after Single dose.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day7after the first dose and from Day17 to Day23 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC0-t) for SHR6390 after Single dose

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day7after the first dose and from Day17 to Day23 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC0-∞) for SHR6390 after Single dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day7after the first dose and from Day17 to Day23 after the second dose
secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum observed serum concentration (Tmax) for SHR6390 after Single dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day7after the first dose and from Day17 to Day23 after the second dose
secondary_outcome.description: Time to elimination half-life (T1/2) for SHR6390 after Single dose.[Time Frame

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day7after the first dose and from Day17 to Day23 after the second dose
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent oral clearance (CL/F) for SHR6390 after Single dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day7after the first dose and from Day17 to Day23 after the second dose
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vz/F) SHR6390 after Single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events and severity of adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Day1 to Day30 after the first dose

intervention.description: SHR6390 tablet single dose、Omeprazol single dose.
